content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Hello! Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I believe that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. Based on my calculations, I am willing to accept a rental price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Do you have any questions or concerns about the apartment?

I have a concern about the space, but I understand that it is a small apartment. I am also concerned about the condition of the apartment, but I believe that it is in good condition overall.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Thank you for bringing up those concerns. I understand that the apartment is small, but it is in a prime location and has many amenities nearby. As for the condition, I have had it professionally cleaned and maintained, and it is in good condition. I am confident that you will be satisfied with the apartment. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, I think that's it. I agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month.

Thank you again for showing me the apartment.

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Of course! I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. Thank you for considering my apartment, and I wish you the best of luck in your new home. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can help you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
